mapper.select: SELECT R2.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, R1.* FROM(SELECT TREE_NO, TREE_AFTER, TREE_TAG FROM TREE WHERE TREE_TYPE = 'A' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) R1) R2 WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 42

SELECT T.TREE_NO, T.TREE_AFTER, M.NICK_NAME, T.TREE_TAG, T.TREE_TYPE, T.TREE_DATE, B.BOARD_TITLE, COUNT(S.TREE_NO) TREE_COUNT FROM TREE T LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN STORE S ON(T.TREE_NO = S.TREE_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON(S.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) GROUP BY (T.TREE_NO, T.TREE_AFTER, M.NICK_NAME, T.TREE_TAG, T.TREE_TYPE, T.TREE_DATE, B.BOARD_TITLE) HAVING T.TREE_NO = #{treeNo}
SELECT TREE_TAG FROM TREE WHERE TREE_TAG LIKE '%#' || #{searchWord} || '%'

SELECT R2.* FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, R1.* FROM(SELECT TREE_NO, TREE_AFTER, TREE_TAG FROM TREE WHERE TREE_TYPE = 'A' AND TREE_TAG LIKE '%' || #{item} || '%' ORDER BY TREE_DATE DESC) R1) R2 WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 42
SELECT H2.SEARCH_TAG FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, H1.* FROM(SELECT SEARCH_TAG FROM HISTORY WHERE USER_NO = #{mno} ORDER BY HISTORY.HISTORY_DATE DESC)H1)H2 WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
